description: Misha Arsellec Lune is a Î² pure-blood Reyvateil, also known to the Teru Tribe as the Hoshiyomi or Star Singer. Her main purpose in life is to sing the song Chronicle Key to suppress Mir. She has been friends with Lyner since their childhood in Platina. It`s worth noting that, despite being older than Aurica, she is trapped in a 12-year old girl body until her Song is recovered. After that, she regains her true form.
name: Misha Arsellec Lune
